CodeList.Name: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Dressing yourself without help.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Dressing Without Help

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Dressing yourself without help. Please indicate why you did not do this in the past 7 days.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Dressing Why Not

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Walking 50 steps/paces on flat ground at a normal speed without stopping.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Walk 50 Steps

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC084-Part I: Walk 50 Steps Why Not
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Walking 50 steps/paces on flat ground at a normal speed without stopping. Please indicate why you did not do this in the past 7 days.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Walk 50 Steps Why Not

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Walking up 20 stairs (2 flights) without stopping.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Walk Up 20 Stairs

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC084-Part I: Walk Up 20 Stairs Why Not
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Walking up 20 stairs (2 flights) without stopping. Please indicate why you did not do this in the past 7 days.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Walk Up 20 Stairs Why Not

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Preparing Meals.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Preparing Meals

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC084-Part I: Preparing Meals Why Not
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Preparing Meals. Please indicate why you did not do this in the past 7 days.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Preparing Meals Why Not

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Washing dishes.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Washing Dishes

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC084-Part I: Washing Dishes Why Not
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Washing dishes. Please indicate why you did not do this in the past 7 days.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Washing Dishes Why Not

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Sweeping or mopping.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Sweeping or mopping. Please indicate why you did not do this in the past 7 days.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC084-Part I: Making a Bed Why Not

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Making a Bed Why Not

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Lifting something weighing 10-20 lbs (about 4.5-9kg, like a large bag of groceries).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Lifting 10-20 Lbs

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC084-Part I: Lifting 10-20 Lbs Why Not
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Lifting something weighing 10-20 lbs (about 4.5-9kg, like a large bag of groceries). Please indicate why you did not do this in the past 7 days.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Lifting 10-20 Lbs Why Not

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Carrying something weighing 10-20 lbs (about 4.5-9kg, like a large bag of groceries) from one room to another.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Carry 10-20 Lbs

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC084-Part I: Carry 10-20 Lbs Why Not

Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Carrying something weighing 10-20 lbs (about 4.5-9kg, like a large bag of groceries) from one room to another. EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Carry 10-20 Lbs Why Not

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Walking (faster than your usual speed) for 1/2 mile (almost 1 km) without stopping.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Walk for 1/2 Mile

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC084-Part I: Walk for 1/2 Mile Why Not
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part II Functional Limitation. Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Dressing yourself without help.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part II: Dressing Without Help
